alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 9:27PM EDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 PM CDT Monday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:05 PM CDT Monday was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then rise to 17.7 feet Friday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
